meanings.sent1: The midmost seat in the car was the most comfortable.
meanings.sent2: The midmost point of the map is where the two rivers meet.
meanings.sent3: The midmost slice of cake disappeared mysteriously from the table.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the midmost light in a dark tunnel.
meanings.sent5: The midmost star in the sky shone the brightest.

meanings.sent1: The midmost shelf in the bookcase held all the classics.
meanings.sent2: She placed the vase on the midmost table in the room.
meanings.sent3: The midmost cookie in the jar looked the most tempting.
meanings.sent4: His voice was like the midmost note in a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The midmost flower in the garden bloomed the most beautifully.
